French Beauty Day Spa
French Beauty Day Spa offers every French spa treatments you could imagine. The diverse collection of treatments, which includes facials, full body massage and signature experiences, are personalised to your individual needs to enhance the very essence of your health and wellbeing, and leave you feeling revitalised.

Dental Magic
At Dental Magic, dental implants, porcelain crowns and veneers are just a few options, along with cosmetic dentistry and general treatments to makeover your smile, making it look as natural and beautiful as possible.

Physiotherapy and Sports Injury Clinic
The IFSC Physiotherapy and Sports Injury Clinic is located in the heart of the IFSC, providing easy access to clients living and working in the Financial District. All of the Physiotherapists working within the practice are members of the Irish Society of Chartered Physiotherapists, which enables patient to have their visits reimbursed.
